extensionLocationBiz:
Up to 100
($10/month for every extra 100 locations)
extensionMemberBiz:
Up to 100
($5/month for every extra 1 user)
extensionProductBiz:
Up to 50,000
($10/month for every extra 1,000 products)
faq1Answer:
Member invite is not included in the Single Plan and can only be used alone. Up to 100 products are allowed and if using Location Mode, 3 locations are allowed. Also, adding options is not available for Single Plan.

The Business Plan allows member invites for up to 10 members for the team’s efficient management. Up to 2,000 products are allowed and if using Location Mode, 10 locations are allowed. Adding options is available anytime with an additional charge.
faq1Question: What’s the difference between the Single Plan and Business Plan?
faq2Answer:
The pricing remains the same, but the accessibility count differs a bit.

  • Multi Mode: The accessibility is counted by the number of registered sub-items.
  • Location Mode: The accessibility is counted by the plan.
    • Single Plan : 3 location (Adding options unavailable)
    • Business Plan : 10 locations (Adding up to 100 locations available / $10 for 10 locations per month)

For more information on each mode, please check out here or the team creating page.
faq2Question: Is the pricing the same with Multi Mode and Location Mode?
faq3Answer:
When creating a team on BoxHero, a 1-month free trial for the Business Plan is applied automatically.

If a paid subscription is not made by the end of the free trial, the team will be switched to the Single plan automatically. Please be aware and check if the accessibility meets the Single Plan’s standard after switching from the Business Plan to prevent any restrictions.
faq3Question: How do I select a plan?
faq4Answer:
Payment information is NOT required for the free trial.

You can start, check it out first and then decide whether you wish to start a subscription.

* If you register your payment information during the trial, the subscription will start once the trial is over.
faq4Question: Do I need to register my payment information to start a free trial?
faq5Answer:
After the Business Plan free trial, your team will be automatically switched to the Single Plan for free.

* The accessibility must be checked to meet the Single Plan’s to prevent any usage restriction.
faq5Question: What happens when the 1-month free trial is over?
faq6Answer: As long as one person from the team makes a payment, it is regarded as a paid team. Therefore, other teammates are not required to make a payment.
faq6Question: Does my teammate also have to pay?
faq7Answer:
To provide a seamless service, BoxHero’s payment system is Stripe, a globally verified payment system for its security.

Users can process the payment with cards (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) authorized for the international payment.
faq7Question: What's the payment method on BoxHero?
faq8Answer:
From the Payment & Settings menu, you can cancel your subscription for the next billing date by clicking the ‘Unsubscribe’ button.

On the next billing date, your team will be automatically switched to the Single Plan. Restoring the cancellation is available before the next billing date.

* Please be reminded that a refund is unavailable for an already paid subscription.
faq8Question: How do I cancel my payment or request a refund?
pageDescription: BoxHero provides affordable pricing plans for everyone.
postscriptBiz:
*Yearly payment discount is not applied when adding options.

*For Multi Mode, accessibility is counted by the number of sub-items.
postscriptFree: *To invite a teammate or register products/locations beyond the given accessibility, upgrading to the Business Plan is required.

topDescMobile:
BoxHero provides reasonable pricing for small to medium-sized businesses.
In a wish to overcome the COVID-19 crisis, we are offering the Single Plan for free.
We are also still in an offer to provide a 30-days free trial for Business Plan,
so do not hesitate to start today.
